Page

Gear S is Samsung's first wearable in the AT&T portfolio with voice and data connectivity with or without a Bluetooth connection to a compatible Samsung smartphone.

 

Gear S highlights include:

•New curved design.

•Fitness tracking and pedometer.

•Real-time GPS with turn-by-turn navigation.

•QWERTY keyboard for composing messages.

•Voice control for searches, messages, and more.
